channel.title: Help with webclient!
channel.description: i have worked so hard trying to get this web client to work, and it does now but when u click a tab like magic tab then another one, they over lap, and seems as though no sprites loaded here is the link: [url=http://slick1989.webs.com/client.html]http://slick1989.webs.com/client.html[/url] any help at all would be gr8 or even letting me know if i have it set where others can login besides me! ty! : )

item.title: Help with webclient!
item.dc:creator: @Torpedo Torpedo
item.description:
@Torpedo wrote:

A little advice, it would look better if you used css, and made the bg image transparent. Also if you centered your client it would help. But i don’t know much of java or w/e still in the process of learning.

Sorry if this isn’t aloud, but if you coded it like this:

Admin-Scape! <-- if you do .css take this out.

Here code be what the .css file could look like:

html { overflow-y: scroll; }

a:active {
outline: none;
}

a img {
border: none;
}

.clear {
clear: both;
font-size: 0px;
height: 0px;
line-height: 0px;
}

body {
padding: 0;
margin: 0;
text-align: center;
font-family: Arial, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif;
}

background: transparent url(http://www.fileden.com/files/2010/2/26/2775889//backround.png) no-repeat center
}

Read full topic
